name: Spider-Man
abilities: On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

name: Spider-Man 2099
abilities: The first time this moves to any location, destroy an enemy card there.

name: Spider-Woman
abilities: On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.

name: Squirrel Girl
abilities: On Reveal: Add a 1-Power Squirrel to each other location.

name: Star-Lord
abilities: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Stature
abilities: Costs 1 if your opponent discarded a card this game.

name: Stegron
abilities: On Reveal: Move an enemy card here one location to the right.

name: Storm
abilities: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

name: Stormbreaker
abilities: On Reveal: Double Beta Ray Bill's Power.

name: Strong Guy
abilities: Ongoing: +6 Power if your hand has 1 or fewer cards.

name: Stryfe
abilities: If your opponent has 12+ Power here at the end of any turn, destroy this.

name: Sunspot
abilities: After each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

name: Super-Skrull
abilities: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.

name: Supergiant
abilities: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

name: Surtur
abilities: After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.

name: Swarm
abilities: When you discard this, add two copies that cost 0 to your hand.

name: Sword Master
abilities: On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

name: Symbiote Spider-Man
abilities: Activate: Merge your lowest-Cost card here with this. Copy its text like it just revealed.

name: Taskmaster
abilities: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if able)

name: Thaddeus Ross
abilities: When your opponent ends a turn with unspent Energy, draw a card with 10 or more Power.

name: Thanos
abilities: At the start of the game, draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

name: The Hood
abilities: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

name: The Infinaut
abilities: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.

name: The Living Tribunal
abilities: Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.

name: The Phoenix Force
abilities: On Reveal: Revive one of your destroyed cards and merge with it. That card can move each turn.

name: Thor
abilities: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

name: Time Stone
abilities: On Reveal: Give Thanos -1 Cost. Draw a card.

name: Titania
abilities: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

name: Toad
abilities: On Reveal: Move the last card you played to this location.

name: Tombstone
abilities: Costs 1 if an enemy card was destroyed last turn.

name: Toxie Doxie
abilities: On Reveal: Draw a card. You can't play cards next turn.

name: Toxin
abilities: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. +2 Power for each returned.

name: Typhoid Mary
abilities: Ongoing: Your other cards here have -2 Power.

name: U.S. Agent
abilities: Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.

name: Uatu the Watcher
abilities: At the start of the game, shows unrevealed locations to you.

name: Ultron
abilities: On Reveal: Deploy four 2-Power Drones to each other location.

name: Uncle Ben
abilities: When this card is destroyed, replace it with Spider-Man.

name: Valentina
abilities: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -2 Power.

name: Valkyrie
abilities: On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to 3 Power.

name: Venom
abilities: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. Add their Power to this card.

name: Vibranium
abilities: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed.

name: Victoria Hand
abilities: Ongoing: Your cards that were created in your hand have +2 Power.

name: Viper
abilities: On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

name: Vision
abilities: You can move this each turn.

name: Viv Vision
abilities: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.

name: Vulture
abilities: When this card moves, +6 Power.

name: War Machine
abilities: Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

name: Warpath
abilities: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +5 Power.

name: Wave
abilities: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

name: Werewolf By Night
abilities: After you play a card, move there to gain +2 Power if it has an On Reveal.

name: White Queen
abilities: On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent's hand into your hand.

name: White Tiger
abilities: On Reveal: Add a 8-Power Tiger to another location.

name: White Widow
abilities: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Kiss to your opponent's side of this location.

name: Wiccan
abilities: On Reveal: If you've spent all your Energy on previous turns, +2 Max Energy.

name: Widow's Bite
abilities: While this is in your hand, you can't draw cards.

name: Widow's Kiss
abilities: Destroy this when your side of this location is full.

name: Witchfire
abilities: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

name: Wolfsbane
abilities: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

name: Wolverine
abilities: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

name: Wong
abilities: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

name: X-23
abilities: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

name: Yellowjacket
abilities: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -1 Power.

name: Yo-Yo
abilities: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

name: Yondu
abilities: On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent's deck.

name: Zabu
abilities: On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

name: Zero
abilities: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
